footer.description: Chisinau, str. Stefan cel Mare 1, tel 0 (123) 45-67-89
footer.subtitle: PieseAuto.ro is an online platform for announcements of new and used car parts from dismantling. Car parts stores advertise aftermarket parts, car accessories and supplies, and authorized car parks offer used original car parts from broken-down cars.
